syria.title: Syria… the heart of the world and a story that keeps repeating itself…
syria.description: In Syria, civilization thrives, and inherited wisdom blends with modern ambition, forming a unique Syrian identity that embraces diversity and shared cultures…

culturalPrinciplesSection.title: Values and Priorities of Cultural Work in Syria

1.title: Enhancing National Pride
1.description: We work to cultivate a sense of national pride among Syrians and strengthen their connection to their ancient and ever-evolving cultural heritage.

2.title: Elevating Syria's International Image
2.description: We strive to highlight Syria's global standing by enhancing its cultural and diplomatic presence and reaffirming its continuous humanitarian and civilizational role.

3.title: Establishing a Human-Centric Approach
3.description: We place the human being at the heart of cultural work to ensure dignity and well-being, providing an environment that gives every individual the recognition they deserve.

4.title: Reviving Cultural and Historical Identity
4.description: We celebrate Syria's ancient heritage and preserve its historical components so they remain an integral part of a sustainable, daily national identity.

5.title: Encouraging the Return of Syrians
5.description: We create a supportive cultural and social environment that encourages Syrians from around the world to return and participate in building a prosperous future for their homeland.

6.title: Transforming Syria into a Global Cultural Destination
6.description: We seek to establish Syria as a significant cultural destination visited by the world to discover its history, arts, and unique human experiences.

7.title: Promoting Opportunities for Growth and Prosperity
7.description: We highlight Syria's growing cultural and economic potential to enhance opportunities for investment, production, and creativity, supporting national societal prosperity.

theUnesco.title: Syrian Heritage on the UNESCO List
theUnesco.description:
From Aleppo's Qudud to the Damascene Rose, and from hand-blown glass to laurel soap, everything in Syria tells the story of a people who shaped their civilization with love and mastery.

The Ministry of Culture continues to preserve this living legacy, ensuring that Syria's heritage remains a testament to a spirit that knows how to create eternal beauty through the passage of time.

visionSection.quote: “Vision is neither a slogan nor a <secondary>decision.</secondary>. Today, it stands as the title of recovery, <primary>the restoration of the civilizational narrative, and the building of the future.</primary>”
